headline: Does BofA’s Upgrade Recast Air Products (APD) Leadership And Project Mix As A More Balanced Story?
summary: Earlier this week, BofA Securities upgraded Air Products and Chemicals to neutral from underperform, expressing greater confidence in CEO Eduardo Menezes and highlighting the need for new conventional gas project wins to rebuild the company’s backlog. This reassessment comes as Air Products balances its large-scale energy transition ambitions with the practical requirement to secure traditional industrial gas contracts that can underpin future project momentum. We’ll now examine how BofA’s...
